title: RBI says India's banking sector is sound and resilient, Gross NPA is below 3%
description: During the Monetary Policy announcement, RBI Governor Shaktikanta Das emphasized India's robust banking system, with gross NPA levels below 3% for scheduled commercial banks and NBFCs as of March 2024. He highlighted factors like improved provisioning, capital adequacy, and profitability, stressing the importance of governance, risk management, and compliance enhancements.
